channel.title: Rs2hd 508 - unnamed
channel.description:
Alright, this is an attempt to have people develop and use Graham's rs2hd 508, for 508's rather than 525+. This is once again, one of many bases i will be releasing to get people interested in going outside the box (meaning, to stop using pali for everything and learn to code by trying new stuff :p).
[SIZE="6"]And the download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ivjnrwfmnh5]http://www.mediafire.com/?ivjnrwfmnh5[/url] [/SIZE]
[code]
[2009/05/13 17:54:41] [GameEngine]: Loading item definitions... [2009/05/13 17:54:54] [GameEngine]: Loaded 11633 item definitions. [2009/05/13 17:54:54] [GameEngine]: Loading npc definitions... [2009/05/13 17:54:54] [GameEngine]: Loaded 5 npc definitions. [2009/05/13 17:54:54] [GameEngine]: Setting up world... [2009/05/13 17:54:54] [GameEngine]: Loading npcs spawns... [2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Loaded 4 npc spawns. [2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Loading item spawns... [2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Loaded 1 item spawns. [2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Loading shops... [2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Loaded 1 shops. [COLOR="Red"][B][2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Initializing EventManager...[/B][/COLOR] [2009/05/13 17:54:55] [GameEngine]: Launching worker thread... [2009/05/13 17:54:59] [GameEngine]: Listening on port 43594.[/code]
So, the origional features were:
'[CODE]Update' server. Login. Binary mapdata loading (and automatic packing if the file does not exist). Player updating - map region loading, walking, running, multiplayer. NPCs - updating, loading definitions + spawns. Command handling. Chatting. Skills. Items - inventory and equipping. Level up interfaces. Skill menus. Emotes and skill cape support. Friends, ignores, PMing. Loading + saving player games (xml). Dual HD and non-HD login: (almost) fully working. Examining items/NPCs. Commands can be typed into the server console (command window). Banking (as far as Pali got it). Event system. Energy. Floor item management. CoordinateEvent system.[/CODE]
What have i done?:
[CODE]-Selling items with no value fixed -Can now change between male and female, just make a command. -Combat lvl now goes to 138 -Global Object system added. -Magic System added -Added EventManager, to be used instead of Process(). [/CODE]
Pictures:
[SPOILER="Pictures"][IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/cb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/equip-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/lvl-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/object.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/pm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/shops-1.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
Off topic, would like to take a moment to thank everyone for:
660 downloads on gamerz-united 508 220 downloads on my Shard Revolutions source 604 on enjoi's client, the worst client ever created. And 300 on my 508 starter pack. (not on this forum i think lmfao.) And the pathetic 9 downloads in 24 for my last source released, on May 12, just yesterday lmfao.

item.description:
@enjoi19 wrote:

Alright, this is an attempt to have people develop and use Graham’s rs2hd 508, for 508’s rather than 525+. This is once again, one of many bases i will be releasing to get people interested in going outside the box (meaning, to stop using pali for everything and learn to code by trying new stuff :p).

[SIZE=“6”]And the download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?ivjnrwfmnh5
[/SIZE]

So, the origional features were:


'[CODE]Update' server.
Login.
Binary mapdata loading (and automatic packing if the file does not exist).
Player updating - map region loading, walking, running, multiplayer.
NPCs - updating, loading definitions + spawns.
Command handling.
Chatting.
Skills.
Items - inventory and equipping.
Level up interfaces.
Skill menus.
Emotes and skill cape support.
Friends, ignores, PMing.
Loading + saving player games (xml).
Dual HD and non-HD login: (almost) fully working.
Examining items/NPCs.
Commands can be typed into the server console (command window).
Banking (as far as Pali got it).
Event system.
Energy.
Floor item management.
CoordinateEvent system.[/CODE]



What have  i done?:

[CODE]-Selling items with no value fixed
-Can now change between male and female, just make a command.
-Combat lvl now goes to 138
-Global Object system added.
-Magic System added
-Added EventManager, to be used instead of Process().
